title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Marcus Jordan Arrest [February 4, 2025]

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Marcus Jordan Arrest [February 4, 2025]
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Marcus Jordan on February 4, 2025.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: February 4, 2025
Location: Maitland, Florida
Suspect: Marcus Jordan, age 34
Incident Summary: Marcus Jordan, son of Michael Jordan, was arrested near Orlando for DUI with property damage, possession of cocaine, and resisting an officer after fleeing a traffic stop. Officers responded to a report of a damaged Lamborghini stuck on railroad tracks, where they found Jordan and his passenger. Jordan was later arrested after field sobriety tests.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who interacted with Marcus Jordan during this incident, including footage from the vehicle approach, arrest, and transportation to the station.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Deneshia "Lil Bit" Harvey

communications.subject: Mississippi Public Records Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Deneshia "Lil Bit" Harvey
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Deneshia "Lil Bit" Harvey on July 1.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: July 1
Location: Walmart, Byram, Mississippi
Suspect: Deneshia "Lil Bit" Harvey
Incident Summary: Deneshia Harvey was involved in a theft at Walmart in Byram where over $1,900 worth of items were stolen. She was later apprehended in McComb after multiple warrants were issued for her arrest.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the incident or interacted with Deneshia "Lil Bit" Harvey during this investigation and arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Anna Stone

communications.subject: Mississippi Public Records Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Anna Stone
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Anna Stone.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Location: 1100 block of Van Buren Avenue, Oxford, Mississippi
Suspect: Anna Stone, 21
Incident Summary: Officers responded to a disturbance at the 1100 block of Van Buren Avenue, where a person had been injured by a broken bottle. Anna Stone was arrested and charged with aggravated assault.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to and interacted with Anna Stone during this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Octavia Wells [December 31, 2024]

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Octavia Wells [December 31, 2024]
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Octavia Wells on December 31, 2024.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: December 31, 2024
Location: [Location of the arrest, such as a specific gas station in Bay County]
Suspect: Octavia Wells, 41
Incident Summary: Wells accidentally texted a narcotics investigator instead of a drug dealer, requesting to purchase fentanyl. The investigator went undercover and arranged a meeting with Wells, who went to a gas station expecting to meet a dealer, but instead met law enforcement. She was arrested for unlawful use of a two-way communication device, possession of drug paraphernalia, and driving with a suspended license.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to and interacted with Wells during this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Kaaliyah October 17th

communications.subject: Ohio Open Records Law Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Kaaliyah October 17th
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the arrest of Kaaliyah on October 17th

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: October 17th
Location: Del Taco, Circleville, Ohio
Suspect: Kaaliyah, 
Incident Summary: Deputies were called to Del Taco in Circleville after a report of theft. Video footage from the restaurant showed Kaaliyah accessing a safe she was not authorized to, counting cash, and taking several thousand dollars. She was later arrested and charged with theft and safecracking.

I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to and interacted with Kaaliyah during this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
